nodes.text: Retinal implants were a type of cybernetic implant designed to fool retinal ID scanners. They could be implanted in a natural or cybernetic eye and could project up to six different retina patterns. The cost of a retinal implant was 1,250 credits.
Retinal implants were mentioned in Gadgets and Gear, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
